function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Implementation of sustainable and resilient development strategies","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement clear guidelines and protocols for virtual interactions, increase sanitation and hygiene measures, and promote vaccination and health education","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular assessments and updates to community service facility planning, investment in adaptable and versatile infrastructure, emergency response training for community personnel","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enforce health and safety guidelines for virtual interactions, promote awareness of cyber hygiene and online security, conduct regular health screenings for community members","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Include pedestrian scale factors and spatial scale changes in community planning, utilize non-contact interaction technologies, and allocate community service facilities and public space more flexibly.","category":"Optimize users flows to prevent contamination","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Promote hybrid models of interaction to maintain in-person connection while leveraging non-contact methods","category":"Social activities / facilitatie social interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Engage community members in redefining and preserving the essence of community space","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Developing efficient queuing systems and optimizing facility layouts","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resource allocation optimization and capacity management","category":"Absorb resource shortages","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conduct targeted research on different types of facilities to understand the impact of non-contact interaction and optimize the configuration of community service facilities to minimize disease transmission risk.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conduct a comprehensive assessment of the impacts of non-contact interaction on each type of community service facility and develop adaptive strategies to address the differential impacts.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Utilize spatial analysis and modeling to understand the spatial scale effect of non-contact interaction and optimize the location and distribution of community service facilities.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Employ user-centered design methodologies and community engagement to understand and address the evolving needs of residents, and integrate flexibility into the design of community service facilities.","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote activities / facilitatie social interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Education and awareness programs on the importance of physical community interaction, promotion of balanced use of virtual and physical spaces","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Flexible and adaptive urban planning strategies, dynamic spatial reorganization, stakeholder engagement in planning water safety measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of virtual and physical space for community interaction","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Equitable distribution of community service facilities based on interaction mode","category":"Maintaining drinking water safety measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Develop strategies to attract customers back to physical commercial service facilities, such as offering incentives and promotions.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement measures to manage and regulate
